findings.liver: Geographic areas of increased density suggestive of focal fat; linear configuration suggests radiation changes; no concerning liver mass; main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow; no ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation; CBD measures 7 mm.
findings.gallbladder: Distended gallbladder; no cholelithiasis, sludge, gallbladder wall edema, or pericholecystic fluid; Sonographic Murphy's sign negative.
findings.pancreas: Not visualized due to overlying bowel gas.
